biotools.summary: Protein-protein interaction (PPI) database linking up structural biology and functional genomics researchers. It offers users (i) a structural perspective and related information about binary subcomplexes that are either structurally characterized or modellable entries in the main functional genomics PPI databases BioGRID, IntAct and HPRD; (ii) selected web services to further investigate the validity of postulated PPI by inspection of their hypothetical modelled interfaces.
